AI Description: VASP (Vienna Ab-initio Simulation Package) is a computer program for atomic scale materials modelling, e.g. electronic structure calculations and quantum-mechanical molecular dynamics, from first principles.
Core Features: Some core features of VASP include Density Functional Theory (DFT) calculations, plane-wave basis sets, ultrasoft pseudopotentials, and various methods for structure optimization and molecular dynamics simulations.
General Tags: Materials Modelling, Electronic Structure Calculations, Quantum-Mechanical Simulations, Dft Calculations, Molecular Dynamics
